text: ยง 17-111 Appropriation for prevention of communicable diseases. The city shall appropriate funds for the use of the department, for the prevention of dangers from communicable diseases found to exist in any part of the city, or for the care of persons exposed to danger from communicable diseases.

chapter.text: DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND MENTAL HYGIENE

heading.catch_text: Appropriation for prevention of communicable diseases.
